I spent some time in China and found a few nice places, made friends and was lucky... ...today I joined a new home! La BLUE MARINE is the most sophisticated place to make people happy. The food was amazing: I tried the French onion soup... ...the high-class steak... ...perfect crepes au sauce d'orange avec cognac... ...as closer cafe & cognac....

Cosy and relaxed place. Went here for the steak and wasn't disappointed. Asked for medium-well done and it was spot on. Nice chicken liver salad to start. Owner gave us a few Danish shots on house. Will come back again.

Perfect stake, cold beer and a warmly attendance from the owner. You can taste some special kinds of "tea" and "coffee" for free. It is a small place (around 40 person) but this is because Bleu Marine is a special place to go to in Beijing.
